body_html:
The following is my scrips of a function which is called iteratively thru for loop, still don't work, and raise type error " 'Tensor' object is not iterable", and the dubuger points to the problem raising from tf.summary.merge(x_summary) statement.

def summary_4_graph(data_x):
x_summary = tf.summary.scalar(data_x.name, data_x)
x_summary_str = tf.summary.merge(x_summary)
return x_summary_str

body:
The following is my scrips of a function which is called iteratively thru for loop, still don't work, and raise type error " 'Tensor' object is not iterable", and the dubuger points to the problem raising from tf.summary.merge(x_summary) statement.

def summary_4_graph(data_x):
    x_summary = tf.summary.scalar(data_x.name, data_x)
    x_summary_str = tf.summary.merge(x_summary)
    return x_summary_str
